extension.name: My quiz results
extension.author: JoomPlace Team
extension.description: This module will display a list of connected user results

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

field.name: quiz_count
field.label: Number of quizzes
field.description: Number of quizzess to be shown

field.name: quizid
field.label: Quiz ID
field.description: Set Quiz ID to display (to specify more than one quiz, seperate with a comma , ).
